page.title: 15HOUSING STYLES
page.content: There are many differnt housing styles in the local area. Each style tells us a lot about different periods of our recent past. The earliest building in Balderton is, of course, the village church which has been on this site since Saxon times. Many houses on Main Street are substantial Georgian and Victorian houses. As you move away from this street the houses become more modern, with large post-war estates surrounding the older original centre. Stone has been replaced by houses made from clay bricks. These are mainly semi-detached with small private gardens and garages. A new trend has been for builders to pay more attention to the landscaping of areas around the houses such as the Barratt estate.
